data.why:
Initially modules related to calculating postage. Similar to
    Business::Shipment. There will be a base module which provides the
    functionality and then additional modules which 'use base ...' it
    which only really contain the data needed. I will contribute such a
    module for using Royal Mail here in the UK. I was thinking of trying
    for the namespace Business::Postage.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (EVDB; Edmund von der Burg)
